Package com.practice.lcn.calc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FlashEffect.IFlashEffect
    function pointer to allow provide a generic callback after the flash effect is over.
    NavButton.OnHoldListener
    listen the event that when the user tries to click and hold this navigation button
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EqtBuilder
    This namespace provides a set of useful functions for manipulating the equation.
    EqtSolver
    This class serves for equation parsing and solving by using the 3rd-party library mXparser.
    EqtTextWatcher
    It keeps track of the user's action, transforms the equation accordingly and renders the "relative" equation to deal with the equation text overflow problem.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FlashEffect
    This class helps create a flash effect on the result display so that the calculator will be more realistic.
    MainActivity
    simple calculator app
    NavButton
    navigation button in this calculator app, such as the left navigation button and right navigation button to move the cursor left or right.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Symbol
    This class defines all symbols that are renderable in the equation display
